meanings: [명사] (선교, 포교) propagation of one's religion, (기독교의) evangelism, proselytization, mission work, missionary work, [동사] propagate one's religion, (기독교를) evangelize, proselytize

vlive.korean: 저 너무 독서 전도사가 됐나요? Have I become too much of a reading evangelist? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : NEW
vlive.english: Have I become too much of a reading evangelist?

vlive.korean: 뭐야 - 형 전도 만들어요? Oh, no. - You make that one? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [선데이키즈] TMI 대잔치
vlive.english: Oh, no. - You make that one?

vlive.korean: 제가 지금 약간 저희 팀 사이에서 앵그리버드 전도사거든요. I'm actually kind of like the PR agent for Angry Bird in our team. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : Shinwon say something
vlive.english: I'm actually kind of like the PR agent for Angry Bird in our team.

vlive.korean: [추진해] - 그래, 태형이 요새 왜 모임 안 모아 - 맞아, 우리 행복 전도사 지금 뭐 하는 거야? [Push ahead] - Yeah, V why don't you plan any gatherings? - What's going on with our happiness preacher? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.85
vlive.english: [Push ahead] - Yeah, V why don't you plan any gatherings? - What's going on with our happiness preacher?

vlive.korean: 웃음전도사? called the "laugh evangelist?" 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ATEEZ] 여설공주🍎와 스마일상어🦈를 제 마음속의 전교회장 부회장으로 임명합니다❗️ (ATEEZ talking about their school days)
